thread.title: RUMOURS: Second Liverpool defender set for January exit
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Second Liverpool defender set for January exit

title: RUMOURS: Second Liverpool defender set for January exit
text:
0 5 Jan 2017 00:52:36 Tiago Ilori is set to join Mamadou Sakho out the door at Anfield during the transfer window, with Reading interested in a loan deal 
Liverpool defender Tiago Ilori has been offered a chance to leave Anfield and join Championship side Reading on loan, according to the Guardian . 
The 23-year-old is not a regular squad member under Jurgen Klopp at Liverpool, and the Royals are interested in taking him on an initial loan deal before signing him permanently at the end of the season. 
Centre-back Ilori is not the only defender linked with a move away in January, as Mamadou Sakho is also expected to leave, with Galatasaray eager to seal a temporary switch.
